string: 遠古神器追尋者的日記，卷二

original:
Skyrim Expedition - Day 19

We have spent two whole days stumbling almost blindly in the dark, and then suddenly there it was! Nchuanthumz! It is here that Klorgic and Duramac built their home! It was once a grand palace, but time and negligence have humbled its mechanical splendor. Nevertheless, by making this discovery, we have etched our places in history.

Skyrim Expedition - Day 20

What a fool I am! To think I could control these mechanical puppets as Duramac did. Based on my notes, it seems I must summon a dwarven sphere overseer and provide it with the following parts: 3 large cogs 3 actuators 1 units of oil But alas, I am a historian, and the language of machines is foreign to me. I've managed to figure out how to summon the overseer by pressing the side buttons on the panel, but I wouldn't know what an actuator was even if it smacked me in the face. For now, I must rest and regain my strength. I am so tired...
string:
天際省遠征：第19天

我們整整花了兩天在黑暗中盲目亂闖，然後它突然就出現了！恩川圖姆茲！克羅吉奇和杜拉馬克就在這裡建造他們的家！這裡曾經是個偉大的宮殿，不過長久以來缺乏維護讓這裡精緻的機械構造失去光采。不論如何，我們單是發現這裡就足以名留青史。

天際省遠征：第20天

我真笨！我還以為自己能和杜拉馬克一樣控制這些機械魁儡。根據我的筆記，我似乎必須召喚矮人機械球監督者，然後提供以下零件： 3個大齒輪 3個推進器 1單位的機油 不過很可惜，我是個歷史學家，可不懂機器的事。我已經找到召喚監督者的方法，只要按下控制板側面的按鈕即可，不過就算把推進器扔到我臉上，我也不知道那是什麼東西。 現在我必須休息，回復體力，我好累......
遠古神器追尋者的日記，卷一

original:
Skyrim Expedition - Day 1

I have arrived in Skyrim to solve a single mystery, to find the lost sanctuary of Nchuanthumz. According to legend, it was built by the famed Dwemer architects, Klorgic and Duramac, the latter of whom is said to be a distant relative of the great Dumac Dwarfking. While the two began as rivals, through mutual respect and admiration they eventually became friends, and over time, much more. Whereas Klorgic was an architect of great renown, his palatial estates suffered from their excess - the size of his rooms matched only by their emptinesss. Duramac, on the other hand, was a genius engineer, but lacked the artistic vision to allow his inventions to reach their full potential. It's only when they joined forces to create Nchuanthumz that they built something truly profound. If I am to find their creation, I must grasp history itself by the tail.

Skyrim Expedition - Day 17

Our travels have brought us to this bleak, underground tunnel, which the natives call Frostroot Cave. Its winding cords of ice and rock make it truly a miserable place. My scales feel chilly, but more so my nerves. Luckily we've hired a few soldiers of fortune into our employ. Some would call them bandits, but I like to refer to them as mercenaries at a discount! Hopefully I can convince them not to touch the artifacts and keep the scrap instead.
string:
天際省遠征：第1天

我已抵達天際省，目的只為了解開一個謎團：尋找恩川圖姆茲的失落聖所。傳說中，它由著名的鍛莫建築師克羅吉奇和杜拉馬克建造，據說後者是偉大矮人王杜馬克的遠親。 雖然他們兩人原本是死對頭，不過後來惺惺相惜成為好友，隨著時間過去，更成為超越友誼的關係。 雖然克羅吉奇是極具盛名的建築師，不過他富麗堂皇的宅邸華而不實，他房間的大小只反映出自己的空虛。另一方面，杜拉馬克是偉大的工程師，不過缺乏藝術品味，無法讓自己的發明完全發揮潛力。 當他們同心協力之後，才建造出恩川圖姆茲這個真正的傑作。如果我要找到他們的作品，就必須從歷史中尋找線索。

天際省遠征：第17天

我們的旅程來到這條嚴峻的地下通道，當地人稱之為寒霜洞穴。這裡的冰塊、岩石和擺盪的繩索確實險惡無比。我覺得鱗片發冷，不過背脊更涼。 幸好我們雇了一些賞金傭兵，有些人以強盜自居，不過我比較喜歡稱他們為便宜的傭兵！希望我能說服他們別碰神器，只要拿些垃圾就好。

original:
The Manufactory assembly lines are out of order. It seems if I press one of the side buttons on the main console, I can summon a dwarven sphere overseer. I'll need to give it the following in order for it to be able to repair the system:

3 large cogs
3 actuators
1 units of oil
string:
製造廠組裝產線無法運作。似乎只要按下主控制台側面的按鈕，就能召喚矮人機械球監督者。我必須提供以下物品，機械球才能修理系統：

3個大齒輪
3個推進器
1單位的機油

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>According to my research, Duramac's constructs were meant to clean and organize the living space. Klorgic was creative but messy, his thoughts a scramble that only Duramac understood.

While the centurion and sphere assembly lines are damaged beyond repair, the spider construct can thankfully do the same work, albeit at a bit slower pace. The assembly line can be powered by placing a dynamo in the actuator, which should provide the energy required to build the construct.

Once the construct is built, I'll need to activate the levers in the house to have it renovate various sections of the home. By my calculations, each section should take no longer than a day to finish.</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>根據我的研究，杜拉馬克的結構體是用於清掃整理居住空間。克羅吉奇有創意卻少根筋，他雜亂無章的想法只有杜拉馬克能理解。

雖然百夫長和機械球組裝產線的損壞無法修理，幸好蜘蛛結構體也能做相同的工作，只是速度較慢。在推進器中放置動力核就能為組裝產線提供動力，這樣應該能提供製造結構體所需的能量。

製造結構體後，我必須啟動房屋裡的拉桿，讓它翻修房屋各處。根據我的計算，每個區域應該可以在一天內完成。</font>

original: Travelers throughout Skyrim have discovered ancient Dwemer ruins full of perilous traps and buried treasure. I've heard rumors, however, of one such sanctuary being used as a home. I should check the surrounding inns for clues on its whereabouts.
string: 天際省各地的旅人都知道遠古鍛莫遺跡充滿危險的陷阱和隱藏的寶藏。不過我聽說有人居住在其中一個聖所裡，我應該在附近的酒館尋找聖所位置的線索。

original: I have discovered the journal of an Argonian named Seeks-Ancient-Artifacts. It details an expedition to Skyrim to find a lost Dwemer sanctuary, Nchuanthumz. If I travel to Frostroot Cave, I might be able to pick up their trail.
string: 我發現一個叫做「遠古神器追尋者」的亞龍人日記，上面詳述他遠道前往天際省尋找失落的鍛莫聖所恩川圖姆茲。如果我前往寒霜洞穴，或許可以找到線索。

original: I've discovered Nchuanthumz but did not find the expedition team. Perhaps if I gain access to his partner's Manufactory, I can learn what happened to them.
string: 我發現了恩川圖姆茲，不過沒找到遠征隊。如果我進入遠征隊員的製造廠，或許可以知道他們發生了什麼事。

original: I've made my way into Nchuanthumz Manufactory and can now explore the area to see what secrets are inside.
string: 我已經進入恩川圖姆茲製造廠，現在可以在這個區域調查其中的秘密。

original: I've made my way into Nchuanthumz Manufactory and can now explore the area to see what secrets are inside. Near a control panel, I found a dead Argonian explorer. I should inspect his body for clues.
string: 我已經進入恩川圖姆茲製造廠，現在可以在這個區域調查其中的秘密。我在一個控制板附近找到亞龍人探險者的屍體，我應該檢查屍體尋找線索。

original: Inside Nchuanthumz Manufactory, I found an Argonian explorer with a journal on his body. It detailed how I might be able to summon a dwarven sphere overseer and provide it with the parts needed to repair the assembly lines in the manufactory in order to bring it fully online.
string: 我在恩川圖姆茲製造廠內發現亞龍人探險者的屍體和日記。日記上詳述如何召喚矮人機械球監督者，只要提供他修理組裝產線的必要零件，就能讓製造廠完全恢復運作。

original: I've made my way into Nchuanthumz Manufactory and can now explore the area to see what secrets are inside. Near a control panel, I found an Argonian explorer with a journal on his body.
string: 我已經進入恩川圖姆茲製造廠，現在可以在這個區域調查其中的秘密。我在一個控制板附近找到亞龍人探險者的屍體，他身上有一本日記。

original: The Nchuanthumz Manufactory is now online. I can build a spider construct at the assembly line using a centurion dynamo core. With the spider construct, I can use it to further restore the sanctuary on the ground floor.
string: 恩川圖姆茲製造廠現在已恢復運作。我可以在組裝產線使用百夫長動力核製造蜘蛛結構體。有了蜘蛛結構體，就能進一步讓聖所的地面部分復原。

original: I provided the dwarven sphere overseer with the requisite parts and can now bring the manufactory back online. I should be able to use the manufactory to restore the sanctuary using the constructs that can be built there.
string: 我把矮人機械球監督者要的零件交給他，現在製造廠可以恢復運作。我應該可以利用製造廠，使用可在現場製造的結構體來復原聖所。

original: Using the Nchuanthumz Manufactory assembly line, I built a spider construct to help renovate the house. Once I summon it using the levers on the ground floor of the sanctuary, I must wait a full day for renovations to complete.
string: 我使用恩川圖姆茲製造廠組裝產線製造了一個蜘蛛結構體，幫忙翻修房屋。使用聖所地面的拉杆召喚它以後，必須等待一整天翻修才能完成。

original: Using the Nchuanthumz Manufactory assembly line, I built a spider construct to help renovate the house. After summoning the construct on the main level of the ruin, I was able to fully restore the home.
string: 我使用恩川圖姆茲製造廠組裝產線製造了一個蜘蛛結構體，幫忙翻修房屋。在遺跡主要區域召喚結構體後，我讓房屋完全復原了。

original: Read the assembly line status report
string: 閱讀組裝產線狀態報告

original: Search for information at The Frozen Hearth

string: 進入恩川圖姆茲製造廠
召喚矮人機械球監督者
閱讀遠古神器追尋者的日記

original: Collect Dwemer Cogs for the Manufactory (<Global=ccAARSSECogCollectionCount>/<Global=ccAARSSECogCollectionTotal>)
Collect Dwemer Actuators for the Manufactory (<Global=ccAARSSEActuatorCollectionCount>/<Global=ccAARSSEActuatorCollectionTotal>)
Collect Dwemer Oil for the Manufactory (<Global=ccAARSSEOilCollectionCount>/<Global=ccAARSSEOilCollectionTotal>)
Return the collected parts to the Dwarven Sphere Overseer
string: 把收集到的零件交給矮人機械球監督者

original: Wait 24 hours for the renovations to finish
string: 等待24小時直到翻修完成

original: Summon the Dwarven Spider Renovator to clean a section of the house
string: 召喚矮人蜘蛛翻修工清掃房屋局部
